meanings.definition: The quality or state of being dissolute.
meanings.sent1: Her dissoluteness was evident in her reckless spending habits.
meanings.sent2: The town was shocked by the dissoluteness of the new nightclub.
meanings.sent3: Despite his dissoluteness, he somehow managed to always have a smile on his face.
meanings.sent4: The dissoluteness of the old building was a stark reminder of its neglected past.
meanings.sent5: The film portrayed the dissoluteness of the main character with raw honesty.

meanings.sent1: The scandal revealed a level of dissoluteness that shocked the community.
meanings.sent2: The novel delved into the world of dissoluteness among the aristocracy.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show exaggerated the dissoluteness of the characters for laughs.
meanings.sent4: The painting symbolized the dissoluteness of society in a powerful way.
meanings.sent5: The song lyrics captured the essence of dissoluteness in a haunting melody.
